name: Generous Givers
title: Top Global Aid Contributor
description: In 2017, Sweden allocated 1.02% of its Gross National Income (GNI) to Official Development Assistance (ODA), making it one of the highest contributors in the world.

name: Tax Titans
title: High Revenue from Other Taxes
description: In 2022, Sweden's revenue from other taxes constituted 28.21% of its total revenue, showcasing its robust tax system.

name: Clean Air Champions
title: Minimal Particulate Emission Damage
description: In 2021, the damage from particulate emissions in Sweden was only 0.009% of its GNI, reflecting its commitment to environmental health.

name: Income Influx
title: High Net Primary Income from Abroad
description: In 2023, Sweden's net primary income from abroad was valued at 176.7 billion constant LCU, indicating strong international economic ties.

name: Education Excellence
title: Near-Universal Male Secondary School Enrollment
description: In 2015, 99.81% of Swedish males were enrolled in secondary education, highlighting the country's commitment to education.
